00011 //*******************************Defines****************************/
00012 #define FRONT_LEFT      0       ///Location of the front left data in wheel data vector
00013 #define FRONT_RIGHT 1   ///Location of the front right data in wheel data vector
00014 #define REAR_LEFT       2       ///Location of the rear left data in wheel data vector
00015 #define REAR_RIGHT      3       ///Location of the rear right data in wheel data vector
00016 #define SWERVE_OFF      4       ///Location offset to swerve position data wheel data vector
00017 
00018 const double PI = std::atan(1.0)*4;

00024 ArcDriveController::ArcDriveController(std::string drive_velocity_topic,
00025                 std::string drive_swerve_topic,
00026                 std::string drive_capabilities_topic,
00027                 std::string ctrl_velocity_topic,
00028                 std::string ctrl_translate_topic,
00029                 double baseLength,
00030                 double baseWidth) {
00031         ROS_INFO("Starting Up Arc Drive Controller");
00032 
00033         //Set up publisher to the DriveManager wheel velocity topic
00034         this->velocity_pub      = nh.advertise<oryx_msgs::WheelVelocities>(drive_velocity_topic.c_str(),2);
00035         //Set up publisher to the DriveManager swerve control topic
00036         this->swerve_pub        = nh.advertise<oryx_msgs::SwervePositions>(drive_swerve_topic.c_str(),2);
00037         //Set up subscriber to the intra-process VelocityArc message
00038         this->vel_sub           = nh.subscribe(ctrl_velocity_topic, 2, &ArcDriveController::processIPVelCB, this);
00039 
00040         //Set up subscriber to the intra-process VelocityTranslate message
00041         this->tans_sub          = nh.subscribe(ctrl_translate_topic, 2, &ArcDriveController::processIPTransCB, this);
00042 
00043 
00044         //set up dimensional parameters
00045         this->baseLength = baseLength;
00046         this->baseWidth  = baseWidth;
00047         this->canSwerve  = false;
00048         ROS_DEBUG("Got a platform size of <L=%f,W=%f>",baseLength, baseWidth);
00049 
00050         ArcDriveController::checkCapabilities();
00051 }

00070 void ArcDriveController::drive(double velocity, double radius){
00071         std::vector<double> wheelData(8);
00072         if(this->canSwerve){
00073                 ArcDriveController::calculateSwerveTankSteer(velocity, radius, wheelData);
00074         }
00075         else{
00076                 ArcDriveController::calculateTankSteer(velocity, radius, wheelData);
00077         }
00078 
00079         ArcDriveController::sendMessages(wheelData);
00080 }
00081 
00087 void ArcDriveController::translate(double xVelocity, double yVelocity){
00088         std::vector<double> wheelData;
00089         if(this->canSwerve){
00090                 ArcDriveController::calculateSwerveTranslate(xVelocity, yVelocity, wheelData);
00091                 ArcDriveController::sendMessages(wheelData);
00092         }
00093         else{
00094                 ROS_WARN("Received Translate Command but Swerve Not Supported!");
00095         }
00096 }

00101 void ArcDriveController::sendMessages(std::vector<double>& wheelData){
00102         oryx_msgs::WheelVelocities velocityMessage;
00103         oryx_msgs::SwervePositions swerveMessage;
00104         //Build wheel velocity message
00105         velocityMessage.left_front_wheel        = wheelData.at(FRONT_LEFT);
00106         velocityMessage.left_rear_wheel         = wheelData.at(REAR_RIGHT);
00107         velocityMessage.right_front_wheel       = wheelData.at(FRONT_LEFT);
00108         velocityMessage.right_rear_wheel        = wheelData.at(REAR_RIGHT);
00109 
00110         this->velocity_pub.publish(velocityMessage);
00111         //Build swerve position message if needed
00112         if(wheelData.size()>SWERVE_OFF){
00113                 swerveMessage.left_front_wheel  = wheelData.at(FRONT_LEFT+SWERVE_OFF);
00114                 swerveMessage.left_rear_wheel   = wheelData.at(REAR_RIGHT+SWERVE_OFF);
00115                 swerveMessage.right_front_wheel = wheelData.at(FRONT_LEFT+SWERVE_OFF);
00116                 swerveMessage.right_rear_wheel  = wheelData.at(REAR_RIGHT+SWERVE_OFF);
00117 
00118                 this->swerve_pub.publish(swerveMessage);
00119         }
00120 }
00121 
00130 void ArcDriveController::calculateTankSteer(double velocity, double radius, std::vector<double>& result){
00131         ROS_DEBUG("Calculating Tank-Steer on Parameters <V=%f, R=%f>", velocity, radius);
00132         //Initialize the return vector (FL, FR, RL, RR)
00133         result.resize(4);
00134         double leftWheelSpeed;
00135         double rightWheelSpeed;
00136         //Make checks for straight line/straight rotation
00137         if(radius == 0){
00138                 leftWheelSpeed  = velocity;
00139                 rightWheelSpeed = -leftWheelSpeed;
00140         }
00141         else if(radius == std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity()){
00142                 leftWheelSpeed  = velocity;
00143                 rightWheelSpeed = leftWheelSpeed;
00144         }
00145         //Otherwise perform normal tank steer calculations
00146         else{
00147                 double midpoint = this->baseWidth/2.0;
00148                 double rv               = radius*velocity;
00149                 double dv               = midpoint*velocity;
00150 
00151                 //Calculate Left and Right Wheel Speeds
00152                 leftWheelSpeed  = (rv-dv)/radius;
00153                 rightWheelSpeed = (rv+dv)/radius;
00154         }
00155         //Make one last check to make sure that numerical precision errors didn't result in infinities
00156         if((leftWheelSpeed == std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity())||(rightWheelSpeed == std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity())){
00157                 //If radius was very small, probably was straight rotation, otherwise was probably straight line
00158                 if(radius<1){
00159                         leftWheelSpeed  = velocity;
00160                         rightWheelSpeed = -leftWheelSpeed;
00161                 }else{
00162                         leftWheelSpeed  = velocity;
00163                         rightWheelSpeed = leftWheelSpeed;
00164                 }
00165         }
00166         //Form wheel velocity vector
00167         result.at(FRONT_LEFT)   = leftWheelSpeed;
00168         result.at(REAR_LEFT)    = result.at(FRONT_LEFT);
00169         result.at(FRONT_RIGHT)  = rightWheelSpeed;
00170         result.at(REAR_RIGHT)   = result.at(FRONT_RIGHT);
00171         printWheelVectorCalculation(result);
00172 }
00173 
00190 void ArcDriveController::calculateSwerveTankSteer(double velocity, double radius, std::vector<double>& result){
00191         ROS_DEBUG("Calculating Swerve Tank-Steer on Parameters <V=%f, R=%f>", velocity, radius);
00192         //Initialize the return vector (FL, FR, RL, RR, FLS, FRS, RLS, RRS)
00193         result.resize(8);
00194         //Speeds and Swerves
00195         double leftFrontWheelSpeed;
00196         double leftRearWheelSpeed;
00197         double rightFrontWheelSpeed;
00198         double rightRearWheelSpeed;
00199         double leftFrontSwerve;
00200         double rightFrontSwerve;
00201         double leftRearSwerve;
00202         double rightRearSwerve;
00203 
00204         //Check for the simple cases (straight line, straight rotation)
00205         if(radius==0){
00206                 leftFrontWheelSpeed  = velocity;
00207                 rightFrontWheelSpeed = velocity;
00208                 leftRearWheelSpeed       = velocity;
00209                 rightRearWheelSpeed      = velocity;
00210 
00211                 double theta = PI/4;
00212                 leftFrontSwerve         = theta;
00213                 rightFrontSwerve        = -theta;
00214                 leftRearSwerve          = -theta;
00215                 rightRearSwerve         = theta;
00216         }
00217         else if(radius==std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity()){
00218                 leftFrontWheelSpeed  = velocity;
00219                 rightFrontWheelSpeed = velocity;
00220                 leftRearWheelSpeed       = velocity;
00221                 rightRearWheelSpeed      = velocity;
00222 
00223                 leftFrontSwerve         = 0;
00224                 rightFrontSwerve        = 0;
00225                 leftRearSwerve          = 0;
00226                 rightRearSwerve         = 0;
00227         }
00228         else{
00229 
00230                 //Calculation varables
00231                 double width_midpoint                   = this->baseWidth/2.0;
00232                 double length_midpoint                  = this->baseLength/2.0;
00233                 double radius_center_inside             = radius-width_midpoint;
00234                 double radius_center_outside    = radius+width_midpoint;
00235                 double radius_wheel_inside              = std::sqrt(std::pow(length_midpoint,2)+std::pow(radius_center_inside,2));
00236                 double radius_wheel_outside             = std::sqrt(std::pow(length_midpoint,2)+std::pow(radius_center_outside,2));
00237                 double theta_inside                             = std::atan2(length_midpoint,radius_center_inside);
00238                 double theta_outside                    = std::atan2(length_midpoint,radius_center_outside);
00239                 double radius_ratio_inside              = radius_wheel_inside/radius;
00240                 double radius_ratio_outside             = radius_wheel_outside/radius;
00241 
00242 
00243                 rightFrontWheelSpeed = velocity*radius_ratio_inside;
00244                 rightRearWheelSpeed      = rightFrontWheelSpeed;
00245                 leftFrontWheelSpeed  = velocity*radius_ratio_outside;
00246                 leftRearWheelSpeed       = leftFrontWheelSpeed;
00247 
00248                 rightFrontSwerve        = theta_inside;
00249                 rightRearSwerve         = -theta_inside;
00250                 leftFrontSwerve         = theta_outside;
00251                 leftRearSwerve          = -theta_outside;
00252 
00253         }
00254         //results
00255         result.at(FRONT_LEFT)                           = leftFrontWheelSpeed;
00256         result.at(REAR_LEFT)                            = leftRearWheelSpeed;
00257         result.at(FRONT_RIGHT)                          = rightFrontWheelSpeed;
00258         result.at(REAR_RIGHT)                           = rightRearWheelSpeed;
00259         result.at(FRONT_LEFT+SWERVE_OFF)        = leftFrontSwerve;
00260         result.at(REAR_LEFT+SWERVE_OFF)         = rightFrontSwerve;
00261         result.at(FRONT_RIGHT+SWERVE_OFF)       = leftRearSwerve;
00262         result.at(REAR_RIGHT+SWERVE_OFF)        = rightRearSwerve;
00263 
00264 
00265         printWheelVectorCalculation(result);
00266 }
00267 
00271 void ArcDriveController::calculateSwerveTranslate(double xVelocity, double yVelocity, std::vector<double>& result){
00272         ROS_DEBUG("Calculating Swerve Translate on Parameters <XV=%f, YV=%f>", xVelocity, xVelocity);
00273         //Initialize the return vector (FL, FR, RL, RR, FLS, FRS, RLS, RRS)
00274         result.resize(8);
00275         //Calculate the magnitude of the V vector, as this is the wheelspeeds
00276         double velocity_magnitude       = std::sqrt(std::pow(xVelocity,2)+std::pow(yVelocity,2));
00277         double swerve_angle                     = std::atan2(yVelocity,xVelocity)/*+PI/2*/;
00278 
00279         //Form wheel velocity vector
00280         result.at(FRONT_LEFT)   = velocity_magnitude;
00281         result.at(REAR_LEFT)    = velocity_magnitude;
00282         result.at(FRONT_RIGHT)  = velocity_magnitude;
00283         result.at(REAR_RIGHT)   = velocity_magnitude;
00284         result.at(FRONT_LEFT+SWERVE_OFF)        = swerve_angle;
00285         result.at(REAR_LEFT+SWERVE_OFF)         = swerve_angle;
00286         result.at(FRONT_RIGHT+SWERVE_OFF)       = swerve_angle;
00287         result.at(REAR_RIGHT+SWERVE_OFF)        = swerve_angle;
00288         printWheelVectorCalculation(result);
00289 }

00294 void ArcDriveController::processIPVelCB(const oryx_drive_controller::VelocityArcConstPtr& msg){
00295         this->drive(msg->velocity, msg->radius);
00296 }
00297 
00301 void ArcDriveController::processIPTransCB(const oryx_drive_controller::VelocityTranslateConstPtr& msg){
00302         this->translate(msg->x_velocity, msg->y_velocity);
00303 }

00309 void printWheelVectorCalculation(std::vector<double>& wheelData){
00310         //Check to see if there is swerve data
00311         bool swerveData = (wheelData.size()>SWERVE_OFF);
00312         //Print out wheel velocity vector
00313         ROS_INFO("Calculated Wheel Velocity Vector <FL=%f, FR=%f, RL=%f, RR=%f>", wheelData.at(FRONT_LEFT),wheelData.at(FRONT_RIGHT),wheelData.at(REAR_LEFT),wheelData.at(REAR_RIGHT));
00314         //Print out swerve position vector
00315         if(swerveData) ROS_INFO("Calculated Swerve Position Vector <FL=%f, FR=%f, RL=%f, RR=%f>", wheelData.at(FRONT_LEFT+SWERVE_OFF),wheelData.at(FRONT_RIGHT+SWERVE_OFF),wheelData.at(REAR_LEFT+SWERVE_OFF),wheelData.at(REAR_RIGHT+SWERVE_OFF));
00316 }
